title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Terror Infrastructures and Missile Unit in Southern Lebanon: A Detailed Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked terror infrastructures and a Hezbollah terrorist organization’s missile unit in Lebanese territory

This morning, an Air Force combat aircraft attacked a Hezbollah terrorist organization’s observation post and terror infrastructure, in the Maroun al-Ras area of southern Lebanon. Shortly thereafter, an IDF unit attacked a missile unit that it had identified in the area.
Overnight, IDF forces fired missiles to eliminate a threat in the large area of Rabel al-Taltin on the Lebanese border.

Also, this morning, several launches from Lebanese territory to Israeli territory were identified.

Documentation of the attacks is attached: https://bit.ly/3vnKwhE
